title: Finterest
content: Finterest - The Finance Club of VGSoM , IIT Kharagpur

Finterest is the Finance club at Vinod Gupta School of Management, IIT Kharagpur.It aims to nurture and enhance the fin-quotient of students and to increase collaboration with the industry. Members are updated on the latest trends and developments in corporate finance, capital markets and investment banking and other related areas by regular club meetings.Their mission is to build a knowledge centre in finance and provide a platform for VGSOM students to enhance skills by sharing, analyzing and applying concepts.
